forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with occasional rain. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
